name: Streamlined
description:
Streamlined is a hovercraft racing game made with Unity 3D. Feel free to dowload the first alpha build for free, and share your feedback. 

For the time being, you are going to need an Xbox One controller to play. I will add keyboard and mouse support in the next update. 

Controls:

- Left joystick: steering
- RT: thrust
- LT: brake
- X: open left wing panel
- B: open right wing panel

Thanks for your support!
